prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Allan T. Gwathmey Collection, Accession #mss 00464, Virginia Military Institute Archives

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was a gift of Elizabeth Gwathmey Jeffress, 1979

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: A collection of certificates, diplomas, and misc. items relating to the educational history of Allan T. Gwathmey, VMI Class of 1923. Gwathmey was an internationally known scientist specializing in the field of single metal crystals; he taught chemistry at the University of Virginia from 1938 until his death in 1963. He was also the founder of the Virginia Institute for Scientific Research.
